Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-50181 affecting package python-urllib3 for versions less than 2.0.7-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-50181 affecting package python-urllib3 for versions less than 2.0.7-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-urllib3 is earlier than 2.0.7-2, affected by CVE-2025-50181
